name: Frogger: the bounty hunter
description:
Welcome ! you little frog I hope you're a frog!

 Like a real one, not a tadpole laying by the side of the road, because this is f** heavy.

You're the most bounty-hunter in the planet, and you're really respected. 

Today you're gonna participate to TV show globally known, and you have to prove yourself by succeeding the contracts which was given to you. 

You have to eliminate these god d** fly, these parasites. You have to catch them all to get your rewind and to climb up the ladder of the

world's reputation, to become the most famous and respected frog in the planet. 

You got your aim, your targets, you know what to do, don't be a wimp.

Oh I almost forgot, rock n roll punctuates your life, so if you don't have the rhythmic in your frog-veins,  you can go somewhere else.

In conclusion don't be shy, show to the world how good you are, and reveal who is the real boss here.

Controls:  Team:
